tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: There is enormous depth to the concept of managing positions and Superalgos offers robust and flexible tools for that matter!

paragraphs.text: However, we don't need to get into the details at this point, as—for the sake of our test—all we need to do is set up initial targets.
Initial targets are set on Phase #1
Later on, you will learn that you may manage your positions in phases, each with its formulas and events to switch back and forth to other phases.
